name: Computer Engineer
details: Designing and developing computer systems, hardware-software integration, and solving complex computing problems.

name: Software Engineer
details: Developing and maintaining software applications and systems, writing code, and solving complex programming problems.

name: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
details: Designing AI models and algorithms, developing intelligent systems, and integrating machine learning into applications.

name: Data Scientist
details: Analyzing large datasets to extract insights, building statistical models, and helping drive data-driven decisions.

name: Electrical and Electronics Engineer
details: Designing and developing electrical circuits and electronic devices, working on power systems, and solving electrical engineering challenges.

name: Electronics and Communications Engineer
details: Developing and improving communication systems and electronic devices, working with signals, and ensuring effective telecommunication networks.

name: Industrial Engineer
details: Optimizing complex processes and systems, improving efficiency and productivity in manufacturing or services, and integrating people, technology, and resources.

name: Mechanical Engineer
details: Designing machines and mechanical systems, analyzing thermal and mechanical processes, and solving engineering problems related to tools and engines.

name: Civil Engineer
details: Planning and constructing infrastructure projects like buildings, roads, and bridges, ensuring structural integrity and safety in built environments.

name: Geomatics Engineer
details: Collecting and analyzing geographical data, creating maps and spatial information systems, and using surveying technology for land measurements.

name: Mechatronics Engineer
details: Designing smart machines and robotics by combining mechanics, electronics, and computer control systems, and solving interdisciplinary engineering problems.

name: Environmental Engineer
details: Developing solutions to environmental problems, managing pollution control and waste treatment, and designing projects to protect air, water, and soil quality.

name: Food Engineer
details: Applying science and engineering to food production, developing new food products and preservation methods, and ensuring quality and safety in food processing.

name: Bioengineer
details: Combining biology and engineering principles to develop medical devices, biotechnologies, or pharmaceuticals, and solving biological and health-related problems.

name: Medical Doctor
details: Diagnosing and treating illnesses, caring for patients’ health, and applying medical knowledge to improve patient outcomes.

name: Dentist
details: Diagnosing and treating oral health issues, performing dental procedures, and helping patients maintain healthy teeth and gums.

name: Pharmacist
details: Preparing and dispensing medications, advising patients on proper drug use, and ensuring safe and effective pharmaceutical care.

name: Physiotherapist
details: Helping patients recover from injuries or illnesses through physical therapy, guiding rehabilitation exercises, and improving mobility and function.

name: Nurse
details: Providing medical care and support to patients, monitoring health conditions, and coordinating with doctors to assist in treatments and patient education.

name: Midwife
details: Assisting women during pregnancy, childbirth, and postpartum, providing prenatal care and delivering babies while ensuring the health of mother and child.

name: Audiologist
details: Diagnosing and treating hearing and balance disorders, conducting hearing tests, and fitting hearing aids to improve patients’ auditory abilities.

name: Medical Imaging Technician
details: Operating X-ray, MRI, or ultrasound equipment to capture images of patients’ bodies, assisting radiologists in diagnosing medical conditions through imaging.

name: Dental Prosthetic Technician
details: Designing and crafting dental prosthetics such as crowns, bridges, and dentures, using molds and materials to create functional and aesthetic dental appliances.

name: Psychologist
details: Studying human behavior and mental processes, assessing and counseling clients, and applying therapeutic techniques to help improve mental well-being.

name: Psychological Counselor
details: Providing guidance and advice to individuals on personal, educational, or career issues, helping them cope with challenges and improve mental health.

name: Sociologist
details: Studying society and social behavior by examining groups, cultures, and institutions, and conducting research to understand social patterns and issues.

name: Philosopher
details: Exploring fundamental questions about knowledge, reality, and ethics, developing theories of thought, and critically analyzing concepts and arguments.

name: Primary School Teacher
details: Educating young children in elementary subjects, managing a classroom, and creating engaging learning experiences for early-grade students.

name: Preschool Teacher
details: Teaching and caring for preschool-aged children, fostering early development through play and activities, and preparing them for primary school.

name: English Teacher
details: Teaching the English language and literature, helping students develop reading, writing, and communication skills, and fostering language proficiency.

name: Turkish Teacher
details: Instructing students in the Turkish language and literature, improving their reading, writing, and comprehension skills, and fostering appreciation of language.

name: Mathematics Teacher
details: Teaching mathematical concepts and problem-solving, helping students understand arithmetic, algebra, geometry, and calculus, and encouraging logical thinking.

name: Science Teacher
details: Educating students in general science topics, conducting experiments in class, and fostering curiosity and understanding of the natural world.

name: Guidance Counselor
details: Advising and supporting students in their academic and personal development, providing career guidance, and helping resolve social or emotional issues in an educational setting.

name: Computer Science Teacher
details: Teaching computer literacy, programming, and educational technology, and guiding students in using technology effectively for learning.

name: Statistician
details: Collecting, analyzing, and interpreting numerical data to solve problems, design experiments or surveys, and guide decision-making with statistical insights.

name: Mathematician
details: Researching and solving theoretical or applied mathematical problems, developing new mathematical models, and advancing knowledge in areas such as algebra or geometry.

name: Physicist
details: Studying the laws of nature, conducting experiments or theoretical research on matter and energy, and advancing knowledge in areas like mechanics, optics, or quantum physics.

name: Chemist
details: Researching chemical substances and reactions, conducting experiments in labs, and developing new materials or compounds for various applications.

name: Biologist
details: Studying living organisms and life processes, conducting research in areas like ecology, genetics, or zoology, and working to understand and protect living systems.

name: Architect
details: Designing buildings and structures, creating architectural plans and models, and ensuring functionality, safety, and aesthetic appeal in construction projects.

name: Interior Designer
details: Planning and designing interior spaces to be functional and aesthetically pleasing, selecting furnishings and color schemes, and meeting clients’ needs for indoor environments.

name: Graphic Designer
details: Creating visual concepts and graphics for branding or communication, using typography, imagery, and digital tools to design logos, brochures, or websites.

name: Industrial Designer
details: Designing products and industrial goods that are functional, ergonomic, and visually appealing, developing prototypes, and considering user experience and manufacturing processes.

name: Visual Communication Designer
details: Crafting visual content for media and communication, integrating design elements to convey messages effectively across print and digital platforms.

name: Fashion Designer
details: Designing clothing and apparel, creating new fashion collections, choosing fabrics and patterns, and combining aesthetics with functionality and market trends.

name: Ceramic and Glass Designer
details: Creating designs for ceramic and glass objects, shaping materials into functional or artistic items, and blending craftsmanship with creative aesthetics.

name: Painter (Artist)
details: Creating art using paint and various mediums, expressing ideas or emotions through visual imagery, and developing a personal artistic style.

name: Sculptor
details: Designing and crafting three-dimensional art pieces using materials like clay, stone, or metal, and combining artistic vision with manual techniques.

name: Musician
details: Performing or composing music in various genres, playing instruments or singing, and expressing artistry through musical sounds and rhythms.

name: Audio Engineer
details: Working with sound and music technology to record, mix, and produce audio content, managing equipment and software to achieve high-quality sound.

name: Classical Musician
details: Performing music at a professional level, often having studied at a conservatory, mastering an instrument or voice, and interpreting complex musical compositions.

name: Actor
details: Performing in theater, film, or television, portraying characters by memorizing scripts and expressing emotions, and engaging audiences through dramatic storytelling.

name: Media Producer
details: Creating content for radio, television, or film, managing production processes, coordinating creative teams, and ensuring the final output meets artistic and technical standards.

name: Journalist
details: Researching and writing news stories or articles, interviewing sources, and delivering information to the public through newspapers, magazines, or online media.

name: Digital Content Creator
details: Developing and producing content for digital platforms and social media, utilizing multimedia tools to engage online audiences, and staying current with new media trends.

name: Public Relations Specialist
details: Managing an organization’s public image, crafting press releases and media campaigns, and building positive relationships with the public and media outlets.

name: Advertising Specialist
details: Creating and executing advertising campaigns, developing marketing messages and visuals, and strategizing to effectively promote products or services.

name: Communication Designer
details: Designing effective communication strategies and materials, combining visual design with messaging to convey ideas clearly across various media.

name: Business Manager
details: Overseeing business operations and teams, making strategic decisions for growth, and managing resources in areas like finance, marketing, or human resources.

name: Economist
details: Studying how resources are produced, distributed, and consumed, analyzing economic data and trends, and advising organizations or governments on economic policy.

name: International Relations Specialist
details: Analyzing global political and economic issues, understanding foreign policies and diplomacy, and working on international cooperation or in diplomatic services.

name: Public Administrator
details: Managing public sector organizations or government departments, implementing policies, overseeing public programs, and ensuring efficient delivery of services to the community.

name: Logistics Manager
details: Coordinating supply chain operations, managing the transport and storage of goods, and optimizing processes to ensure timely and efficient delivery.

name: Marketing Specialist
details: Researching consumer needs and market trends, developing marketing strategies and campaigns, and promoting products or services to target audiences.

name: International Trade Specialist
details: Managing and facilitating trade between countries, understanding international markets and regulations, and negotiating deals or contracts for global business transactions.

name: Financial Officer
details: Managing budgets and financial resources, analyzing fiscal data and economic trends, and guiding financial decision-making for organizations or government agencies.

name: Labor Economist
details: Studying labor markets and employment trends, analyzing worker-employer dynamics, and advising on policies related to wages, labor relations, and workforce development.

name: Political Scientist
details: Researching political systems, behavior, and public policies, analyzing government structures, and providing insights into political trends and outcomes.

name: Social Worker
details: Helping individuals and communities resolve personal and social problems, connecting people with services, and advocating for the well-being of vulnerable populations.

name: Entrepreneur
details: Starting and managing new business ventures, innovating products or services, and taking financial risks to bring new ideas to the market.

name: Aviation Manager
details: Overseeing operations in the aviation industry such as airlines or airports, ensuring safety, managing logistics, and coordinating flights and services.

name: Pilot
details: Flying aircraft to transport passengers or goods, navigating and communicating with air traffic control, and ensuring the safe operation of flights under various conditions.

name: Aeronautical Engineer
details: Designing and developing aircraft and aerospace systems, analyzing aerodynamic performance, and solving engineering challenges related to flight technology.

name: Maritime Transportation Engineer
details: Managing and operating maritime transport systems, planning shipping routes, and ensuring efficient and safe movement of vessels and cargo across waterways.

name: Marine Engineer
details: Designing and maintaining ship engines and mechanical systems, ensuring the operation of marine vessels, and solving engineering problems at sea.

name: Veterinarian
details: Diagnosing and treating health issues in animals, performing medical procedures or surgeries on pets and livestock, and advising owners on animal care and nutrition.

name: Agricultural Engineer
details: Developing technology and machinery to improve farming and food production, designing irrigation systems, and solving problems related to agriculture and sustainability.

name: Forester
details: Managing and conserving forest resources, planning harvesting and replanting, and protecting wildlife habitats and ecosystems in woodland areas.

name: Horticulturist
details: Cultivating garden plants, breeding new plant varieties, managing orchards or nurseries, and applying botanical knowledge to improve plant growth and health.

name: Soil Scientist
details: Studying soil composition and fertility, advising on soil management and crop nutrition, and researching ways to improve soil health for agriculture.

name: Landscape Architect
details: Designing outdoor spaces and gardens, integrating natural elements with built environments, and planning sustainable, functional, and visually pleasing landscapes.

name: Agricultural Economist
details: Analyzing economic aspects of agriculture, studying market trends in food and farming, and advising on agricultural policies and agribusiness strategies.

name: Archaeologist
details: Excavating and studying ancient sites and artifacts, analyzing historical objects and remains, and interpreting past human cultures through material findings.

name: Anthropologist
details: Studying human cultures and societies, conducting fieldwork and observations, and researching human behavior, traditions, and evolution across different communities.

name: Art Historian
details: Researching the history and development of art, analyzing artworks and their cultural contexts, and preserving or curating art collections for education and exhibition.

name: Historian
details: Researching and analyzing past events, studying historical documents and sources, and writing interpretations or narratives about different eras and their significance.

name: Geographer
details: Studying the Earth’s landscapes, environments, and human relationships with space, using tools like GIS to analyze geographic data and spatial patterns.

name: Religious Education Teacher
details: Teaching students about religious culture and moral values, explaining ethical principles, and fostering understanding of diverse religious traditions in an educational setting.

name: Theologian
details: Studying religious beliefs, texts, and history, interpreting spiritual teachings, and engaging in scholarly or community work related to faith and ethics.

name: Paralegal
details: Assisting lawyers by preparing legal documents, researching laws and regulations, and helping manage case files within the justice system.

name: Lawyer
details: Advising and representing clients in legal matters, interpreting laws and regulations, preparing legal documents, and advocating in court or negotiations.

name: Banking and Finance Specialist
details: Working in the financial sector, handling banking services or financial products, analyzing market trends, and advising on investments and financial planning.

name: Insurance Specialist
details: Assessing risk and designing insurance policies, advising clients on coverage options, and analyzing data to set premiums and handle claims.

name: Real Estate Manager
details: Overseeing property sales or rentals, managing real estate portfolios, dealing with clients and contracts, and ensuring properties are maintained and profitable.

name: Hospitality Manager
details: Managing hotels, resorts, or tourism services, ensuring customer satisfaction, coordinating staff, and overseeing operations in the hospitality industry.

name: Chef
details: Planning menus and cooking meals in restaurants or hotels, experimenting with recipes, managing kitchen staff, and focusing on taste and presentation.

name: Culinary Expert
details: Specializing in the art and science of food, understanding gastronomy, developing culinary concepts, and possibly working on menu innovation or food critique.

name: Sports Manager
details: Organizing and managing sports teams or athletic programs, handling budgets and logistics, and developing strategies to improve team performance and revenue.

name: Physical Education Teacher
details: Teaching students sports and exercise, promoting physical fitness, and organizing school athletic activities and health education.

name: Sports Coach
details: Training athletes or teams in a specific sport, developing practice plans and game strategies, and motivating players to improve their skills and performance.

name: Recreation Specialist
details: Planning and leading recreational activities and programs for communities or organizations, promoting leisure, wellness, and active participation for various age groups.

name: Photographer
details: Capturing images using cameras, composing and lighting shots, and editing photographs for artistic, commercial, or journalistic purposes.

name: Fashion Photographer
details: Specializing in photographing clothing and models, working closely with designers and art directors, and creating images that showcase fashion in a creative way.

name: Information and Records Manager
details: Organizing and maintaining information systems and archives, managing document databases, and ensuring efficient retrieval and preservation of records.

name: Librarian
details: Managing library resources, helping people find information, organizing books and digital media, and promoting reading and information literacy.

name: Animator
details: Creating animated images or characters using drawings or computer software, bringing stories to life through motion graphics in films, games, or videos.

name: Game Designer
details: Conceptualizing and developing video game ideas, designing gameplay mechanics and storylines, and collaborating with developers and artists to create interactive entertainment.

name: 3D Animator
details: Designing and animating three-dimensional models for films, games, or simulations, using specialized software to create lifelike motion and visual effects.

name: Web Developer
details: Designing and coding websites, ensuring functionality and user-friendly design, and working with web technologies to build online applications.

name: Mobile App Developer
details: Creating applications for mobile devices, writing code for iOS or Android, and designing user interfaces and features for smartphone and tablet apps.

name: Software Test Specialist
details: Testing software applications to find bugs and issues, creating test cases, and ensuring that programs meet quality standards and user requirements.

name: Data Analyst
details: Examining and interpreting data sets to identify trends and insights, preparing reports or visualizations, and aiding organizations in making data-driven decisions.

name: Cybersecurity Specialist
details: Protecting computer systems and networks from security breaches, monitoring for cyber threats, and implementing measures to secure data and infrastructure.

name: Robotics Programmer
details: Developing software for robots and automated systems, integrating sensors and actuators, and writing code to enable robots to perform desired tasks.

name: AI Systems Engineer
details: Building and maintaining artificial intelligence systems, developing machine learning models, and implementing AI solutions to solve complex problems.

name: Business Intelligence Analyst
details: Analyzing business data and trends, using data mining techniques to extract insights, and helping organizations make strategic, data-driven decisions.
